list.name: Default
list.comment: Re #96. Trading of bags works. Including trading of sub bags. Tested with 4 levels of bags inside each other.

task.summary: Default task

changelist.name: Trade work
changelist.comment: Locked / unlocked whole containers when needed. Removed item if any of its parent bags are being traded.

task.summary: Progression on the text position calculator. Untested code.
Progress on dynamic book objects. Moved all book related files into a Book directory.
Re #407 Implemented a standard book object.
Re #407 Fixed some issues in the code. Started on an implementation example: Signature. Also changed edit of books in simple items so that it opens the edit book action directly.
Fixed a minor issue where book font sizes were strings instead of numbers.
Ref #410 Added a easier spotable edit buttons in the book UI.
Ref #410 Fixed an issue where the slider where not being initialized correctly to a value.
Ref #410 The color picker should now initialize the color text boxes correctly.
Ref #410 Fixed an issue with a too large label for page number in the link to page. Clarified the usage by changing the menu title.
Re #410 Fixed an issue where the empty scroll frame were shown in the image chosing menu when it did not contain images.
Measured map data for lower eastern kingdoms.
Map progress

Added a lot of timer identifiers as part of debugging. Commiting them, as they can be useful for debugging in the future. Also a minor improvement in stacks, so they do not load timers for item update sequences not being there.

Re #376. Found the bugger. Get all depending items were looping infinitely in the special case where an item A depends on item B, which depends on item C, wich then in return also depends on item B and both item B and item C are not currently existing in any containers.

Re #376. This time in the right branch :s. Get all depending items were looping infinitely in the special case where an item A depends on item B, which depends on item C, wich then in return also depends on item B and both item B and item C are not currently existing in any containers.
Re #410. Enable and disable of next and prev buttons in the multi page edit field.
Re #392. Consilidate buff UI should no longer overlap the GHI buffs.
Fixed an issue with the slider that blocked item creation.
Dynamic action for tradeable bag.
Re #96. Trading of bags works. Including trading of sub bags. Tested with 4 levels of bags inside each other.
Re #96. Almost everything is done with trade.
Re #96. Implemented a "Waiting for item data" sign, when trade item data takes longer than expected to transfer.
Re #96. Implemented an error message when trying to trade bags to a player with GHI version lower than 2.1.2.
Re #297. Implemented cooldown information from attributes. Also fixed an issue where the "on click" dynamic actions would be given the same stack for all instances of the item.
Updated all toc numbers. Adjusted the action node to be a bit less dominant.
Fixed several issues with sliders, due to the new patch.
Update version number as part of release
Progress on #443. Converting to tabs.
Progress on re #443 while testing how git works.
More progress on Re #443 while testing how git works.
Fixed some issues with the code editor and removed some GHM debugging.
Re #196. The reimplementing texturing, now in correct branch.
Re #429. Imported map code from earlier svn branch.
Fixed compatibility bugs
Progress on GHG.
Fixed an issue with the icon picker.
Solution for the export problem. Including a safety switch.
Progress on GHG group log. This code got into the wrong branch.
Progress on GHG event log.
Fixed encryption bug for GHG.

Fixed issues in GHG regarding communication. Improved sharing of keys, so that players loosing their data would get access again as soon as they are online at the same time as one from their group. Converted the rank data into a number where each rank permission can be extracted, in order to save space and bandwidth when transferring data.
Adjusted the sliders in the simple item menu into using the newer slider. Modified the slider so that the slider graphics is centered vertically.
Minor book progress.

Re #96. Almost everything is done with trade.
Re #96. Implemented a "Waiting for item data" sign, when trade item data takes longer than expected to transfer.
Re #96. Implemented an error message when trying to trade bags to a player with GHI version lower than 2.1.2.
Re #297. Implemented cooldown information from attributes. Also fixed an issue where the "on click" dynamic actions would be given the same stack for all instances of the item.
Updated all toc numbers. Adjusted the action node to be a bit less dominant.
Fixed several issues with sliders, due to the new patch.

Progress on GHG event log.
Fixed encryption bug for GHG.

Fixed issues in GHG regarding communication. Improved sharing of keys, so that players loosing their data would get access again as soon as they are online at the same time as one from their group. Converted the rank data into a number where each rank permission can be extracted, in order to save space and bandwidth when transferring data.
Adjusted the sliders in the simple item menu into using the newer slider. Modified the slider so that the slider graphics is centered vertically.
Minor book progress.
Missing toolbar changes
